title: Stocks decline amid doubts about a US-China trade deal CNBC - msnNOW

content:
Stocks struggled Monday amid doubts of a breakthrough in U.S.-China trade talks, which are set to begin later this week.

The Dow was down 50 points, while the S&P 500 fell 0.3% and the Nasdaq slipped 0.15%.
